content: CP 653 Firestop speed sleeve Pathway device for high-traffic cabling with optimal airflow control ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Functional and compliant when properly installed Twist-to-close mechanism – for easier and remote re-penetration while protecting cables Straightforward inspection – you can see if the sleeve is closed without having to check behind a covering fringe above the ceiling Superior smoke tightness and airflow control thanks to its twisting mechanism Smoke gaskets eliminate need for sealant or putty Applications Firestopping cable penetrations for single and bundled cables Suitable for small to medium-sized circular openings in walls, ceilings and floors For use on concrete, masonry and drywall For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2365150 - Firestop sleeve CP 653 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2365151 - Firestop sleeve CP 653 4 - Package Size 1 pc - 3501660 - Gangplate 16 combo (speed sleeve 4) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x FS gangplate CFS-SL GP 16 - 3x Firestop sleeve CP 653 4 - 3501661 - Gangplate 24 combo (speed sleeve 4) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x FS gangplate CFS-SL GP 24 - 4x Firestop sleeve CP 653 4 - 3549774 - 50 CP 653 4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 50x Firestop sleeve CP 653 4
